K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-1: a'arya ma h'a san ni p'a ta ratna ke tu dh'a ra n'i n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-3: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo mdo; bam po dang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-5: tshangs pa chen po dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-6: de la phyag btsas te bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i zungs 'di sbyor bar bgyi'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-7: bdag gis rig sngags 'di grub par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-9: aa b'a me aa b'a me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-12: pa ru kun dza na ta na ta pu ska ra ba ha dza lu kha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-17: mu dre mu dra mu khe sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-18: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:289b-19: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa na dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-1: zad pa; nyon mongs pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-2: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-3: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-4: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-6: glang po chen po; ;bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-9: bdag gi don rab tu thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-10: srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-11: yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba; sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-12: byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-13: lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-14: chu lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-15: bzang po'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-16: rgyal ba'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-17: 'od kyi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-18: nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-19: glog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-20: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-21: thub dka' gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-22: chu lha gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-23: dri med gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290a-25: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad kyang bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-0: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye @290b shes can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-1: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-2: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-6: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-7: thabs shes pa la mkhas pa sha stag dang mang thabs cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-8: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na kun tu rgyu mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-11: rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-16: pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-18: g-yog gi tshogs can de gnyis phan tshun 'di ltar bdag cag las gang gis thog mar bdud rtsi thob pa des gcig la gcig spran to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-20: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-21: lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-22: kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod yul du zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-23: mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-24: ji ltar dge slong 'di spyod lam mdzes pa de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:290b-25: bdag gis sngon chad dge sbyong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-0: mir gyur pa gzhan su la'ang gang la'ang sngon ma mthong @291a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-1: na; bdag de'i gan du song ste tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi ston pa gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-3: gang gi chos la dga' zhes 'dri'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-4: snyam nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-5: yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-6: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-12: sh'akya'i sras po brtul zhugs dka' thub chen po kun gyi dam pa dbang dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-13: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin cing grol la de bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-14: sangs rgyas zhes bya sad mdzad mi mnyam sdug bsngal mtsho skem da ltar 'di na yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-15: dri ma med pa de yi skyabs su rtag par nga song de yi chos la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-17: khyod kyi ston pa ji skad smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-19: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291a-20: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-0: ji ltar 'jig rten las @291b dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-1: las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de'ang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-2: gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-3: thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-4: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la nyon mongs pa med pa skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-5: des na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-6: sangs rgyas kyis ni shin tu rnyed dka' thos rnyed bdud rtsi'i chos bshad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-7: 'di ni rtag tu skye ba'i 'bab chu skem par bden pa khong du chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-8: de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-9: lam 'di dam pa shes rab chos rnams sgom pa mi nyams byed pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-10: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-11: tshe dang ldan pa; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-12: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:291b-15: rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-0: ral pa can stong rab tu byung ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs @292a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-2: bdag gi grogs po'i mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-3: slob ma'i 'khor la bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-4: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te slar song nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-5: kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-6: mthong nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-8: khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-13: kun tu dkar ba las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-15: khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-19: kho bos bdud rtsi rnyed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-21: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-22: kho bos ci rnyed pa khyod la bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-23: de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te kun tu rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-24: gang gis srid gsum rgya mtsho myur rgal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292a-25: phung po dgra chen rnam par gzhig bya ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-0: mya ngan med zhi lam de shod cig @292b dang; ;yang 'byung med pa'i lam du 'jug par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-1: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-2: ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-3: las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de'ang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-4: gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-5: thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-6: pang nas skyes kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-7: sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya phyir dri ma med pa zhi ba'i chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-8: nyon mongs lta ngan nyes pa thams cad zhi byed mi shes gcod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-9: 'di ni 'dus byas gsog gsob de phyir stong pa slu bar thub pas gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-10: de thos zhi ba reg 'gyur dri ma med pa'i tshig de zlos te gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-12: ji ltar 'jig rten las dang nyon mongs rgyur bcas byed rgyu ldan 'byung dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-13: las dang nyon mongs pa dag ldog rgyu de'ang 'dren pas rab tu gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-14: gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-15: thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-16: de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis de nyid du chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-17: nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par sbyangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:292b-18: de nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-0: yang dag spyod pa 'di ni chu @293a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-1: bo sgrol ba zhi ba mgyogs pa'i gzings //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-2: ye shes mchog 'di sdug bsngal gsum po zhi byed 'khor lo'i pha rol 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-3: 'di ni yongs su shes na nyon mongs phung po 'joms zhing bdud 'dul 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-4: thar pa 'di ni dgra dang 'thab mo bsal cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skem //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-5: pang nas skyes kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da lta ga la bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-8: tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs zhes thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-10: bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu 'byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-11: pang nas skyes kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-14: bdag cag gi 'khor la bltas te rab tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-15: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-16: pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-17: de nas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can gyis yul aangga ma ga dha na mkhas shing snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293a-19: grags par ldan pa skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-0: pang nas skyes g-yog dang bcas te dge sbyong goo ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu @293b 'byung bar 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-1: zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-2: kyi hud de gnyis gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma'i slob mar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-3: bdag gi bdud kyi yul stongs par byed par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-4: bdag der song ste skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu 'byung ba las bzlog la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-5: sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-7: de nas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can myur du bdag gi khang pa nas mi snang bar byas te tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-9: spyod lam du bsgyur nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun na lam gar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-10: kho bos sngar smras rgyu dang byed rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-11: khyed gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges pa bgam par bya ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-12: smras pa de dag thams cad don yod ma yin 'di la rgyu yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-13: dge dang mi dge'i las de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-14: myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod rtsed mo byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-15: skye rga na 'chi med cing sdug bsngal med de 'jig rten pha rol med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-16: bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las bskyed 'bras med rgyu dang byed pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-17: rnyed phyir 'dir ni sh'akya'i bu yis smras kyi dad pas ma 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:293b-19: pang nas skyes gnyis ka 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-0: kye ma bdud sdig can bdag cag rab tu byung ba las bzlog @294a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-2: snyam nas de nas nye rgyal rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas rang gi 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-3: bram ze'i khye'u khyod nyon cig 'khor ba'i skyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-4: dran par gyis la 'jig rten rga ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-5: gzir zhing 'chi bdag gis ni rab bskor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-6: de gnyis spang phyir rab byung legs par gzung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-7: de nas pang nas skyes kyis bdud la slar smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-8: mkhas pa'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gsum mthar phyin mchog chos rnams kun shes kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-9: rnam pa kun tu bdag cag blo gros 'di las bskyod nus su yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-10: sred pa rab zhi bya phyir bdag cag brtan pa'i yid kyis rtag tu 'bad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-11: sengge'i gzugs can wa yi tshig gis nged kyi blo gros ma sgyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-12: bden pa mthong ba'i lha gang dag nam mkha' la 'dug pa de dag gis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-14: skyes bu dam pa khyed gnyis legs so; ;legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-18: 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i lam yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-20: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-0: @294b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags shing bstod pa'i lam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-1: de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-2: de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-3: pang nas skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-8: 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'byung bar yang dag par chas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-9: khyed kyis shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-10: khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-12: de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-13: bdag cag cung zad shes pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthun /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-14: khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-15: khyed gang las rab tu 'byung ba de las bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:294b-16: de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-0: pang nas skyes g-yog lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gyis rig nas ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong goo ta ma'i gan du 'gro mi nus par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi logs su g-yang sa chen po zabs su dpag tshad @295a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-3: ci nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-4: pang nas skyes gnyis g-yang sa chen po de mi mthong zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-5: yang bdud sdig can gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du ri chen po brtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-8: gcig tu stug por gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-10: 'phang du dpag tshad stong yod pa zhig mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-11: sengge khro zhing gdug la gtum pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-12: sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri de'ang ma mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-14: sengge'ang ma mthong; sengge'i skad kyang ma thos te lam drang por bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-16: 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-21: g-yog gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-0: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis @295b g-yog dang bcas pa nga'i thad du rab tu byung nas gcig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-1: nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-3: rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro; ;de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-4: skyes bu mkhas pa g-yog ldan 'di gnyis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-5: rdzu 'phrul ldan dang shes rab 'jigs med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-6: mi mchog phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-7: bdag gis de gnyis bsti stang bskyed nas bsu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-8: de nas dge slong de stan las langs nas dge slong mang po dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-10: rab tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bsus nas bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-11: de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-14: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-15: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:295b-20: bram ze rgyal gyi bu lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-3: bdag de las skyes pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-4: de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-5: sh'a ri'i bu zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-6: bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-7: pang nas skyes kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-12: bdag de las skyes pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-13: de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-14: moonggal gyi bu zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-15: bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-17: moonggal gyi bu nga'i thad du g-yog dang bcas te tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-18: de nyid kyis de gnyis rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-19: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-21: moonggal gyi bu g-yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par bdud sdig can dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-22: gang dag bstan bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-23: de kun nga yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pa nga //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-24: goo ta ma slob ma 'khor bcas nga la deng myur skyabs tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-25: mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam ni khyed la bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-0: khyod lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror @296b 'dren cing sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-1: nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skem byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-2: 'chal ba 'dzem pa med cing mu cor smra ba wa skad de yang ci zhig zer; ;khyod ni bcom zin bdud kyi las kyis nga la da yang 'dir ni byed mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-3: de nas bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs mi snang bar byas nas tshangs pa'i cha lugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-4: khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs sred pa'i myu gu rab tu bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-5: de yi sman chad thub pa ji snyed sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal spro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-6: gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod 'gyur skye bo gang na'ang ma mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-7: dus 'di lags na skyon dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur mi 'da'; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-8: ngas 'dul gang 'khod sems can mtshungs med gangg'a'i bye ma snyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-9: ngas mthong de dag nga yi snying rjes thar par bya ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-10: 'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar thug na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-11: de nas mya ngan 'da' yi blo gros ngan pa g-yos ci bskul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:296b-12: de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la bcags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-0: de'i mod la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun phan @297a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-1: tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang bar zhugs te 'dug pa su'ang mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-3: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-7: byug pa thogs te rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-8: lha ba lhub dag gis bdag cag brgyan nas rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lha'i sil snyan byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-9: rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs gyis glu len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-10: gar pa byed cing yan lag la dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil snyan dag byas nas dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang ldan par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-11: bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas pos te sgra ma byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-12: sgra ma byed ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-13: yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-14: yang glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-15: bdud sdig can gyis lag pa gnyis g-yabs te bos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-16: lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-18: sil snyan lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-19: yang de bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa bsgrengs nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-20: sgra ma byed ces zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-21: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297a-22: lha'i bu mo de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-0: de nas lha'i bu mo dbyangs snyan glog ces bya bas @297b bdud sdig can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-1: gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir 'chi 'pho'i ltas shig gzigs sam ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-2: 'on tam ci zhig de ring 'gro ba zhugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-3: 'on te 'di ni khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lags sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-4: ci yi slad du khyed ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-6: nga la dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-7: sa steng sh'akya'i bu pho sgyu ma bslabs pa'i blo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-8: de ni ci nas gal te brlags par ma gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-9: de yis nga yi 'dod khams 'di ni stong par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-11: gtso bo srid gsum bcings sred rgya mtsho mtha' ring la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-12: zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-13: bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-14: de la de ring ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-16: sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i zhags pa can; ;stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang gzhu thogs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-17: 'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang mthun gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-18: srid pa ma lus zlog pa nye bar bstan par byed pa po; ;de yi slob ma bsam gtan la ni mngon par brtson yid kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:297b-19: dpen par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad par bya phyir khor zug tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-0: cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong @298a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-2: nags kyi nang dag dang ni ri yi sman ljongs rnams na gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-3: rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs dang nying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-4: dam pa nye rgyal bang nas skyes gnyis thub pas btul par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-5: rab du la chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du btul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-6: des ni nga yi 'dod khams 'di dag stong bar byed par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-7: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bdud sdig can las bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang bral ba'i glog ces bya ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-8: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-16: rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-18: sil snyan nas rgyan gyi bar du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal du bab par gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-19: bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g-yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-20: de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298a-21: rangs pa skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-0: gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu ba bces @298b dge slong de dag theg tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-3: moonggal gyi bu g-yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-4: rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-9: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-10: bdud sdig can gyi g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam gyis bdud kyi khang pa de nas nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char chen po nas rgyan gyi bar gyi char phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-11: de dag ring por mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-12: nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-13: de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-14: brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-16: rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:298b-17: de nas yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi khang pa der gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-1: ma lus skyem pa 'gro ba'i mig gcig pu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-2: mig ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-3: khyod deng lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro ba sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-4: thub pa bdag cag ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-5: lha dang mis mchod don dam gsung ba bcom ldan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-6: bdag cag mthun par bud med smad pa nyid spangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-7: blo mchog khyod kyi 'phrul gyi drung du myur bar ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-8: mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung mnyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-9: bdag med gsung ba don dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-10: byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med nor gsung sgron //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-11: mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-12: da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bstan gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-13: de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag stan las langs nas mgrin gcig tu bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-14: nyes byas blo gros can khyod snying po med g-yo ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-15: dpal rnyed ci phyir bcom ldan 'das la sdang bar sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-16: dregs pas gos nas skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-17: lus kun gtses te mi bzad gnas su nye bar song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-18: de ltar khro ba sdangs te rgyal la dad par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-19: 'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs pa'i 'dam las thar pa'i bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-20: 'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299a-21: thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gi myur du bzhud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-0: @299b de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-1: bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-2: gang g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te 'di nas bzlog la 'gro mi nus par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-4: bdud des de dag bcing bar ma nus so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-5: 'di ltar g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-6: de nas g-yog mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud sdig can gyi drung nas dong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-7: de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te de 'di snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-8: bdag gis yang 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas te; ci nas bdag gis g-yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad 'khrul nas dge sbyong goo ta ma mi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi gnas su 'ong bar nam mkha' 'di dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-9: rlung nag po chen pos kun tu khyab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-10: snyam na'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:299b-11: tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-0: de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug bsngal te yid @300a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-1: mi bde zhing yid la gcags nas du zhing skad chen pos rang gi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-2: tshogs kyi 'khor la bos te bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-3: sdug ba'i bu dang tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-4: nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-5: sh'akya'i bu 'di sgyu ldan g-yo can ngag 'jam la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-6: khong nas rang bzhin dug sdong 'dra ba 'dir skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-7: de nas sgra des bdud kyi g-yog mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-8: bdud kyi bu mo de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-9: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rings pa'i gzugs kyis myur du lhags nas bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-10: 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-11: ci slad thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-12: sreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'di nas khyod ma 'phos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-13: 'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma mchis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-14: khyod ci rmongs par gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-16: sh'akya'i bu pho dmangs phal shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300a-17: ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i dgra med smras //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-0: stobs gcig ldan pa g-yo can de yis thams @300b cad rnams ba du mar bslus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-1: bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lce 'bar dang bcas pa'i me yis bsregs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-2: 'jig rten 'di na skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags pa; ;mkhas pa bstan bcos snyan dang gas mang po byed brtson mthun par myur bar yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-3: chos kyi kyo ba btang gis drangs te sh'akya'i bu 'di'i skyabs deng song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-4: lus mdzes g-yo can blo gros ldan 'di nga yi dgrar ni rab tu gnad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-5: rab tu sdug pa'i g-yog mo de dag snying rje med pas nga bor te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-6: nga la dpang btsugs nas ni de ring dge sbyong de yi skyabs su dong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-7: gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs chen 'di deng thal bar ma byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-8: g-yo dang sgyu srid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stong par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-9: de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-12: stobs kyi yul gyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-13: rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te sh'akya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid nus pa de lta na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-15: de ltar ma nus na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-17: yab nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:300b-18: gang bdag cag sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-0: sngar sh'akya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi @301a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-1: stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-2: da g-yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-3: bdud sdig can gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-5: dengs la gal te dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di gsod nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-7: ci ste ma nus na'ang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-9: de nas bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bcu gnyis pho de dag de nas 'phags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-10: 'di nas steng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bkang nas de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul drag po bsten te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-11: gang gling bzhi pa'i nam mkha' thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-12: rlung nag po chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-13: skar mdas bkang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la'ang lag gis brdabs te gling bzhi ba thams cad rab tu g-yos par byas nas shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-16: gnod sbyin dang; gnod sbyin chen po dag gis sa chen po brag dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-17: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang g-yos par rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-19: mtsho chen po dang; 'bab chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301a-22: rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-0: bdud kyi 'khor de @301b dag ni; ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char mngon par sprul te nam mkha' las kun tu 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-13: shin tu rad rod can dang; sra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-16: rno ba'i char rab tu sprul te kun tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-17: zhes de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-19: mtshon cha de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-20: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-25: mand'a ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char chen por byin gyis brlabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-26: yul aangga ma ga dhar skar mda' ltung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-27: spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-29: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-30: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-33: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-34: mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-35: phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang; dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-36: bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-37: byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:301b-38: len pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-0: len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar @302a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-4: rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-5: gang gling bzhi pa 'di na rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-10: ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-11: rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-12: bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-13: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re las kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-15: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302a-31: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ba nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-0: nam mkha' la @302b 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-1: me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-2: sems can dmyal ba pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-6: dge ba'i rtsa bsngon bskyed pa dran nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-7: zhes byas te ngan song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-8: bdud kyi sde de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-9: bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-10: rnam dag sku mnga' mchog tu gzugs bzang pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-11: ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-12: grags pa 'jig rten bkram nas lha ma me ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-13: mngon po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-14: rab tu lam stor rnam par mig zum la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-15: khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma nyi ma 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-16: gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-17: ded dpon khyod la skyabs su rab tu mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:302b-18: shin tu tshogs bsags ye shes 'byor ba'i mdzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-1: bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-2: thugs rje bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-3: don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-4: 'khor ba'i dgon pa las ni khyod thar mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-5: tshogs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-6: byams la gnas shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-7: thugs rje gnas pa'i skyabs su rab tu mchi; ;sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-8: sred pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-9: mi shes nad sel 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-10: sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-11: chu bo bzhi dbus zam par gyur pa khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-12: nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-13: yang dag lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-14: thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-15: blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-16: khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod bsam pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-17: mgon po dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-18: khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-19: bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-20: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi; ;sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-21: bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303a-22: ci nas bdag cag pha rol phyin spyod par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-0: bdag cag @303b rnams la spyod pa rgya cher ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-1: gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-2: ldan na byang chub rab tu thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-3: me tog gang gis khyod la mngon gtor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-4: phyogs kun du yang de dag gdugs gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-5: dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhing du ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-6: rkang gnyis mchog gi spyi bor 'dug gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-7: de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-8: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-9: me tog sil ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gangg'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma las 'das pa'i me tog gi gdugs kun tu 'dug par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-10: me tog gi gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-11: bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:303b-12: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang 'chad pa 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te lham me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-0: lhang nger bzhugs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar @304a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-1: snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-4: gzugs 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sengge'i khri tha dad cing 'khor tha dad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-9: bdud kyi 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-10: mos pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-11: de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyir log nas bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshar bdud sdig can la rgya cher bzlas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-12: dge sbyong goo ta ma de'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhig par ma nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304a-14: de'i steng du bdud nyi khri de'i skyabs su dong ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-0: de nas @304b bdud sdig can rab tu khros te sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te des 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-1: sh'akya'i bu ni ji srid brlags par ma byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-2: de srid bar du nga yi dpal song slar mi 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-3: sh'akya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring gsad snyam ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-4: bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog cing mi smra 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-5: de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-6: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-7: bdud spa bkong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-8: bam po gnyis pa; de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-9: bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-11: bdag cag ni; 'di lta bu'i theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:304b-19: ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to //
