K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362a-16: ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362a-17: rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362a-19: chu bo bzhi las yang dag par brgal bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362a-20: zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362a-21: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-0: sems @362b can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-2: sdig can khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-3: de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-4: ci ste sdig med khyod la thab zhe sdang rgyags med na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-5: ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-6: de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-7: thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci 'dra ba dag la 'di shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-9: nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-10: de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la gsang bar rab tu sbyar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-11: de tshe nga la 'khon dang tha ba cung zad tsam yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-12: nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-13: nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g-yo bar byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-14: nga gsad phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-15: de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur bskams byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-16: khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma ci ma byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-17: nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-18: nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zas kyang bcad par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-19: khyod kyis rtag tu nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:362b-20: nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-0: de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis @363a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-2: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzi char drag po rab tu phab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-3: sa ni 'dom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-4: zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-5: nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-6: 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-7: nga ni gsad par bya phyir khyod kyis sengge rab tu btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-8: de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drang po'i dug kyang btab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-9: nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-10: rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-11: 'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-12: khyod kyis dur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bskus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-13: de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-14: nga gsad phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-15: 'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-16: ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-17: 'on kyang ngo tsha bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-18: sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-19: khyod kyis sems can bye ba dum ma rungs byas nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-20: snying rje bor te 'dir yang nga la rgol zhing sgyu byed dam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-21: nga yis zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363a-22: nga gsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-0: sa steng nga la lhas byin gyis ni @363b rdo ba 'phangs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-1: kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-2: phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-3: me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-4: kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-5: de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-6: khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-7: nga gsad phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-8: 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g-yos na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-9: ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas da dung 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-10: ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du yang btsud kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-11: sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-12: zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-13: nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-14: nga ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-15: khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu bgegs byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-16: thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-17: rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don yang spyad par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-18: smras par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su btang bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-19: nga la phrag dog byed ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-20: khyed ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:363b-21: nga la gsol dang khyod yid zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-0: mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud @364a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-2: de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-3: 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dad par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-4: khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rab sems kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-5: khyod dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams par rab tu dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-6: sdig pa'i blo gros por la dad bcas yid la byos shig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-7: ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-8: de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la rab tu khros te 'khrugs shing rngam nas de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-9: bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-10: 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-12: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364a-14: me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-1: bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-9: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-10: dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-12: dgra dang phas kyis rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:364b-26: dus ma yin par gang zhing tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-0: sgra mi snyan pa thams cad @365a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-1: rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-6: mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-7: rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-8: rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-9: shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-10: lam drang po rab tu ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-18: yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-26: lo thams cad mthun par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-31: sman thams cad grub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-36: dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-39: yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-47: spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-48: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-49: 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-50: theg pa chen po ston par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365a-51: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-0: sems can chen po rnams dbugs 'byin pa @365b phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-1: sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-2: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-3: dbang bskur ba'i chos dang byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-4: gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-5: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-6: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-8: bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-9: chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-10: chos kyi ros sems can rnams tshim par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-11: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-12: bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-13: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-14: chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-15: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-16: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:365b-17: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-0: da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @366a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-1: gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-2: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-4: gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus yongs su 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-6: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-8: gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-9: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-11: bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366a-12: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-0: 'di ltar yon tan bsam @366b gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-1: chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-2: chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-3: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-4: bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa nas phung po'i lhag ma mchis pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-5: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-6: 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-7: skye bo phal po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-10: sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-11: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-13: nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:366b-14: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-0: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin @367a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de dang lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-3: ngan pa spyod pa las bzlog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-4: bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-5: bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-6: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-8: gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas te chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-10: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-11: khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367a-12: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa @367b gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-1: chos de yang nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-5: bdud kyi yul thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-7: sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-8: da nged lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-9: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-12: gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la'ang phyag bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:367b-16: chos nyan par rdo thogs pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-0: de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs @368a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-2: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-3: der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa rnams la mchod pa bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-4: de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-5: der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis yul bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de'ang blta bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-6: 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-7: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-8: nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-10: khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-11: go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tshom ma za zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-12: de ltar nem nur ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-0: yongs su brtag par bzung ste sems can gang la la sems can gyi @368b khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched las gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur tu zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-1: sems can re re zhing yang yul dang gnas kyi go skabs yangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-2: sems can de dag phan tshun du mig rgyang gis kyang mi sleb bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-3: yungs 'bru gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni; thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-8: gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-11: rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-14: thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-16: gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:368b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la skra'i rtse mo de gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad bcug kyang bri ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-0: gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar @369a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-1: snang ba de thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-3: me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-5: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-6: me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-7: rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-9: gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-10: rlung gi khams de thams cad ba spu'i khung bu de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-12: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-13: gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-14: rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod kyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-15: phan tshun gnod pa'ang med la rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba'am; gang bar yang mi mngon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369a-17: thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-0: gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems @369b can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-5: tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-8: 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-11: bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-12: gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas bzung ste dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na srid pa 'grub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-15: sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-16: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang gcig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-17: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-18: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-21: sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-23: mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:369b-24: mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i @370a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-1: ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-2: mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-3: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-4: mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-6: yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la @370b 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-1: de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-4: nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-5: byon nas kyang padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-6: yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog ces bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o; ;de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-7: yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:370b-8: 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-0: steng gi logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba byon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye @371a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-1: ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de nas gshegs par chas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-2: sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang gi bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis padma'i gdan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-6: dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-7: gong du smos pa bzhin sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-11: chos nyan pas bskor nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-13: rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371a-14: yang de'i tshe na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas @371b sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-1: the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-2: thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-3: sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-5: byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-7: zhing 'di mchod rten gyur ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-8: zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so; ;gang na sems can smad pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-9: zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ldan 'dir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-10: thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng mi gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-12: de ring bdud ngan tshar bcad cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-13: nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-14: spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-15: de yi don du kun nas gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-16: yid ni rab tu dad byos la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-17: bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-18: chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-19: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-20: theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-21: bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-22: nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-23: gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-24: gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-25: srung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-26: de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-27: 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-28: dam chos yun ring gnas bya'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-29: sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-30: chos rnams thams cad sdud pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:371b-31: gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu @372a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-1: med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams padma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te deng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-3: bzod pa yongs su bsgoms pa mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu mthun pa bshad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-5: 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-6: bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-7: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol la chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-9: dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-10: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-12: 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-13: thams cad srung ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-18: spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-19: bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372a-24: snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-2: bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-4: dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-5: thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-6: dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-7: lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-9: dran pa'i snod du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-10: spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-11: byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzugs 'di da 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-12: chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-13: yun ring du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chud mi 'dza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-15: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-18: de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-31: gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-32: chos thams cad mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:372b-34: mi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-0: rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi @373a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-1: dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-2: gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon sum du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-3: sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan par bgyid par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-4: sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-5: phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-6: lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas padma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-8: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-12: mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373a-14: sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-0: srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar @373b 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-1: sems can so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-3: bdag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-4: 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-5: snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-6: yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad bsten te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-9: bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-10: bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:373b-11: de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i @374a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-1: phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-10: lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-11: da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-12: bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-13: sems can bsam pa nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-15: ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-16: ngan song gsum du zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-17: mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa; dge ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-18: mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-19: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-22: snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374a-23: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-1: chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-7: yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-8: sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-12: mi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-13: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du sbom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-19: phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-24: dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas rtsva'i mal cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-28: reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-29: bdag gis thabs mkhas pa ndang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-31: brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-39: yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-47: las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:374b-54: dge sbyong rnams la bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-1: las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-2: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-3: mngon du ma bgyis pa mngon du bgyi bar gzud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-4: ma thar pa rnams rab tu thar par bgyi ba'i slad du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-5: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-6: de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-9: phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-16: bud med kyi tshig dag gis skur pa 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-18: bdag la gsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-29: bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-37: tshan po che rnams kyang 'gyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375a-40: gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-0: bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du bzhugs pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams @375b kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du 'dzud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-1: thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-2: bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-3: chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-4: chos kyi grub shig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-5: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-6: bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-7: da sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-8: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-9: bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-10: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi chad par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-11: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-12: dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-13: sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-17: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-21: dus ma yin par grang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-28: lta ba ngan pa ya nga ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:375b-34: mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-1: yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-7: ltas ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-12: bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-16: rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-17: byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-26: spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376a-27: dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-0: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs te gcig la gcig dgyes pa de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir @376b dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-1: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-2: bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-3: ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-5: mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-6: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-7: chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-9: bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-10: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-11: de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lags kyang bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:376b-12: chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-0: bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du byin gyis @377a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-1: brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-2: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-3: gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-9: bha ya mi ha; mi tra ma bha se /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-23: mi tra aa nu p'a le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-31: ta ka ba r'a na te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-41: sa sya ta th'a t'a na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-56: ma h'a sa ra sa ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-57: tu tu tu tu; ma h'a sadya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-61: dhu ma pa ri ha re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-63: ru tsi ne ka ra kshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-69: shi shi ra shi shi ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-70: lo ka bi n'a ya ka badzre badzre dha re badzre ba te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377a-79: bham ga bam ba re shva ra sha tsa tsi li tsu ru p'u re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-2: ma kha shva ra la ya ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-6: sarba sa sya aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-8: ni ni p'a la ra ti /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-17: ka ka n'a da ba ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-19: aa yur ha na kanda dzva la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-22: m'arga aa bhi ro ha ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-26: ya tha badzra ya sv'a gra ya tha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-27: pa ra na tsa hri da y'a b'a ha satya pa ri bh'a ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-28: m'arga aa bhi ro ha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-29: aa tsa la buddhi da da pra tsa la pa tsa ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-32: aa tsa le sho dha ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-34: ai li ai li le; pra bhe sa ra pra te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-37: aa na ba ra na pra te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-40: sha mi ni mi bra hm'a ba yo ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-50: ma h'a da bhu ta bya ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-51: su mu dra be g'a ba dha ra ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-54: su ra pra ti sam bi dha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-58: bidyu ta ra se na kshi ti /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-59: mu dri to si; ye ke tsida pra ti bhi b'a ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-60: ba ha ba ha ba ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-62: she la pra t'i tya hri da ye na mu dri t'a dha ra ni na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-63: dha ra dha ra dha ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-64: d'a na ti la hu ksha sarba hri da ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-65: mu dri to si dzud do dza bad ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-68: ma h'a aad bh'u ta mu dri ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-70: sha da ya ta na ni shri t'a bhu ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-75: a'arya aa dhishth'a na bha pa th'a n'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:377b-76: n+ya th'a ma h'a pu n+ye sa mu tstsha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-1: ma h'a k'a ru na ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-2: mu dri ta sarba sam mya ga pra ti bad tsi r'a dha tran dzva la tu dharma ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-3: tri sarbe mu ni bhi sha bha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-6: dzny'a na la bha ba len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-8: aa bhi b'i rya ba le na aa dhishthi te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-9: sarba bh'u ta au pa tsa y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-10: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-14: zhes lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-15: kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-16: kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-17: nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-18: kye ma'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-19: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyi byin gyi rlabs ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-20: bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-21: bdud kyi zhags pa kun gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-22: dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-23: chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-24: chos kyi phyogs srung ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-25: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378a-26: sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-0: sems can thams cad kyis @378b snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-2: 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-4: skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-5: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-6: gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangg'a'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-7: bzod pa thob par gyur to; ;yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-8: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-9: rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-11: byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-12: mkhas pa 'di ni rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-13: gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-14: mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-16: mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-17: bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-18: dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-19: dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi chad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-20: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:378b-21: sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-2: sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-3: rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-4: 'di na ngan byas zlog byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-5: lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-6: byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-7: byang chub lam yang rab ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-8: pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-9: bzang por spyod pa rdzogs byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-10: thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-11: 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-12: dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-13: gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-14: byang chub lam las mi g-yob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-15: chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-16: gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-17: bsal nas lhag par mos par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-19: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-20: chos smra rnams ni bsrung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-21: nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-22: gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-23: bdag gis de yang bshad par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-24: sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-25: sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-26: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-28: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379a-29: bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-0: dge @379b bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos la me tog sna tshogs bkram pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-1: spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-2: ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-5: ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-8: ba dan bsgrengs pas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su sengge'i khri reg na 'jam pa la 'dug ste gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-13: de'i lus la su'ang dbugs mi gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-14: klad pa na bar byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-28: byin pa na bar byed sus kyang mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-31: de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-32: chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa'am [?]/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-33: skad 'gag par gyur na'ang des gzung 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-34: las yongs su byang nas bde bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-35: chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang su'ang khams 'khrug pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-36: skad 'gag par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:379b-37: gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-1: skad 'gag pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-2: de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyad de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-4: gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-8: mee tri soo ma ba te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-15: m'a ra ba ta th'a t'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-16: pa ri tshe da ba ha sa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-23: ae ka n'a ya sa pa ri tstshe de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-24: tsa ndi na ba ra sa tri ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-25: kha ga su ra tri ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-26: sta ba su ra tri ne; bhu t'a ko ti pa ri tstshe de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-29: dzva la kha n'a ma kha sha kha ka ka kha ha h'a ha h'a hu hu spa ra sha be da na pa ri tstshe da na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-30: aa ma m'a n+yu ma ma khya ma ma sa mu dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-32: sam sk'a ra na ya pa ri tstshe da na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-33: bo dhi satv'a ksh'a ti bi ma ma h'a ba mi bhu t'a ko ti a'a ka sha sh'a sa pa ri tstshe da sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-34: yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380a-35: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-3: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-4: sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-8: stobs che ba drag shul dang ldan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-9: dgra thams cad zlog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-13: ltas ngan pa thams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-15: ye shes chen po bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-16: bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-18: yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-26: rgyan chen po mchog rnams kyis lus brgyan nas bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan snga na 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:380b-27: de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyi ba la der bdag la bgegs cung @381a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-1: zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-2: bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-3: chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig srung ba bshad par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-4: ci nas slad ma'i dus na bdud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-16: de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-26: mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-27: chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-28: skabs tshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-30: chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang 'tshe ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-34: lus la dbugs chen po gtong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-35: tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381a-36: bdag gis bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-0: bri stsal bar @381b bgyi na; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-1: 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-2: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-3: de nas brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzin ces bya ba dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-4: de nas brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-8: 'dir bag med par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-11: byis pa rnams ni spros la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-12: de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-13: de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-14: 'dus byas dag kyang ston pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-18: tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-22: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:381b-24: 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid sgro btags pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-0: ji ltar 'du byed gsum la nam mkha' mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin @382a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-1: du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spro bar mi mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-6: de bzhin du srog la ma yin; skye ba po la ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-12: skye mched rnams la'ang spro bar mi mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-14: che zhe; khyod kyis ji ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spro bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-18: rtog rtogs te tshig smros shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-19: khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur gyur ta re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-20: [?] skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-21: sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brgyan nas bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-25: 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma rjod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-26: de nas brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-28: bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-29: 'di skad smras pas bdag 'bras bu mi sdug pa thob par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382a-30: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-0: gal te brgya @382b byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-1: de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-4: gal te des ma gshegs su zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-5: tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-6: de bas na rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-7: ci nas kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-11: de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-14: nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-22: lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-23: bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-26: nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dad pa stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:382b-27: gang slad ma'i dus na bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar gyis de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dad pa stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-1: tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-2: mnas bsgag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-3: yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-4: bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dang pa 'bul lo; ;bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus na gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-6: dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-9: nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-10: bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-12: nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-13: skyes bu dam pa gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-14: de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-17: nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383a-32: m'u la pa ri tstshe de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-5: ma h'a sam ku tsa ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-8: aa m'u la pa ri barte /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-9: aa s'a ra kha ba sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-11: mang po tshogs par mi spyod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-12: mig mi mthong zhing mgo yang 'gas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-15: aa ca ca aa ba ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-17: khra kha sha tsa ta ta kha tsa tsa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-18: khra ga ca tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa na tsa ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-21: ha m'u mu la tsa tsa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-24: de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad nas sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-26: 'di skad ces kyang smras so; ;stobs chen stobs kyis shugs shin tu 'joms pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-27: phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'dis btab na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-29: tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-30: 'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-33: sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:383b-35: bdud kyi 'khor glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshol du nye bar 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-1: yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-10: dge slong ma bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-11: kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-12: zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing tha na sems kyi skad cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-13: gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-18: sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-19: bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin par lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-20: de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-23: lus rul cing dri nga ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-24: rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-25: de dag sa gas par ltung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-26: rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-27: rdul gyis kyang yog nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thom par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-28: gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-30: sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384a-31: gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-0: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par @384b dad pa'i rgyal rigs nas zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tshe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-1: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-2: de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas pa nas de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-3: yang yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag gis bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-5: sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-6: der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-7: sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bskrad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-11: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-12: dus ma lags pa'i char dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-16: nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mthun pa rnams bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-22: chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-25: bsti stang chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-26: yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-31: brgya byin gyi nang du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:384b-32: brgya byin kun gyis bkur ba nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-7: lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-8: de dag kun gyis bkur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-9: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-10: rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-13: spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la mig mi 'dzum par bltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-15: gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa ci'ang ma yin par bltas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-17: kye khyod mig mi 'dzum par ci'ang ma yin pa'i bar du nga la ci zhig blta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-18: ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-19: ci'ang ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-22: gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385a-23: zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-0: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas @385b 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-4: de'i slad du ma rig pa zhes gsungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-6: gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na; srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de dag ga las skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-7: ci nam mkha' las skye zhes bgyir ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-8: nam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-10: rigs kyi bu; de de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-13: ji ltar nam mkha' rdzas ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-18: rnam par rtog pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-23: dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-24: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-25: yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su bcad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-27: gang ba med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-29: tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-30: cha shas med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-32: mi g-yo zhing rnam par bzhag pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-34: dngos po dang; mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-35: tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-36: sgro btags pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:385b-37: yang dag pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-0: kun tu rtog pa las srid @386a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-1: pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-2: bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-3: de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-4: gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-5: de ci'i slad du ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-8: pha rol gnon pas khyod 'di ltar bdag la 'tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-10: bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-13: ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-14: gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyis bslab pa la slob pa na de dag la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i spyod pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-15: gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-17: nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-18: tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-21: dbang phyug chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386a-22: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-0: lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dag gang @386b bar bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-1: snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nad mi zad pas btab ste sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-2: lus kyang rul la dri nga bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-3: yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-4: bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-5: de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-7: grul bum dang; sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-8: bdag cag kyang thos ma thag tu klad pa na bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-9: lus kyang rul zhing dri nga bar gyur nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-12: khyod kyis 'das pa de ngan par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-13: nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe khyod kyis nga gsad pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kyi sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-14: nam mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te nga gsad pa'i bar du bkye bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-15: de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-17: yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-18: de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-19: mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-21: sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:386b-23: ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-0: skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa @387a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-2: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-3: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa nas mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-4: mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-6: khyod da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-8: khyod klad pa na ba'i sdug bsngal mi zad pa'i tshor ba 'di las thar par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-9: mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-10: bdud kyi yul las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-11: yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri bzhi stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-12: bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-13: sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
