K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-14: bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-15: ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-16: thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di'ang thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-17: de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387a-18: gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du klad pa na bar gyur kyang bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g-yo rgyus byang chub tu sems mi bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-0: de nas @387b tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-1: bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos gtad pa gzung bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-3: nga yang sh'akya thub pa'i nyi nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstan pa 'di la chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-4: yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-5: gang du byung ba der ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-6: shin tu lhag par 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-10: yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-11: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-13: gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-14: don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-15: gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na bris nas 'chang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-16: gang na chos smra ba'i sengge'i khri la mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-17: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-18: de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:387b-19: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag 'gug par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-0: bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs der @388a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-1: mchis nas chos smra ba de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-2: chos nyan pa de dag bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-10: n'a da n'a da; pushka ra ma h'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-15: k'i rti tsa ra mu dre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-16: mu dra mu khe sv'a h'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-18: gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-19: bdag gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yongs su dag pas thos te der ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-22: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-23: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-25: bdag der mchis la chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-26: chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-28: chos nyan pa de dag gi nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-31: the tshom thams cad bsal bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-33: phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388a-35: kun chub par bgyid pa der bdag 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-0: @388b pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-2: dus ma legs pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-5: bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-8: dur khrod rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-9: de nas bkra mi shis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-15: ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-19: reg na mi bde ba'i dug de dag thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-20: der tsha ba dang mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-30: mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:388b-31: der sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:389b-4: aa mu hu la pa ri tstshe de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:390b-38: gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:390b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:390b-41: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:390b-42: rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu mthu che ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:391a-3: spyod pa ji lta bu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:391b-5: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:391b-7: 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:392a-2: de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:392a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:392a-8: des smon lam 'di skad du nam phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:392a-10: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang; pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:392b-0: ting nge 'dzin bkod pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs @392b re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:393b-15: me tog sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-17: 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-18: 'byor pa'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-19: de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis yang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-24: ri brag gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-27: glegs bam la bris te bsti stang bgyi ba'i grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-31: ri brag de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-32: de dang de dag tu shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394a-34: lo tog gi bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-0: de dag thams cad @394b na me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-1: 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshim par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-4: tshe bas pa ma gtogs par gal te de na sems can me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-5: 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-6: 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-7: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-8: 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-9: bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-10: gang yang de na sems can rnams me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-12: bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-15: 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas gang sems can de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-17: snying rje'i sems su 'gyur ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-18: bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-19: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-21: 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-22: bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-23: gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:394b-24: bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-2: 'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-3: ri dvags kyang chos 'tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-5: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-6: gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du byung ba der sems can rnams kyi 'bras dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-15: gang dag lo tog tu gyur pa de dag 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-17: lo tog mang po dag gis kyang mdzod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-18: bang ba thams cad yongs su gtams par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-19: de na sems can gang tha na bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-20: ri dvags dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-22: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-23: der bdag gi bu ram shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-25: bal bo se'u'i khu shugs shin tu mang po bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-26: der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-28: bya skyogs rnams yongs su gtams par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-29: gang de la tha na bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-30: ri dvags la sogs pas 'tshal na'ang de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395a-31: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-0: de ltar bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @395b mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis bdag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-3: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-6: khyod 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po byed nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-11: rtul ba de lta bus sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-12: de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rtog de las dbugs 'byin pa de thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-14: gang la la zhig na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-15: gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-19: me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-20: kun spyod pa'i slad du rab tu snum bag can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-23: shin tu ro bda' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:395b-24: shin tu yongs su kha dog dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-3: sems can rnams kyi mdzod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-7: bya skyogs rnams shin tu yongs su gtams par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-9: ri dvags kyis de la 'tshal kyang de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-10: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-11: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa stong thams cad du sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'di lta bu dag gis tshim par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-12: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams su bskal pa stong re re la'ang skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-13: de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-14: bdag gi las yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-17: rang gi smon lam gyis 'gugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-20: tsa me kha; tsam me kha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-22: ba ha ba ha ba ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-23: sma ra aasma ra k'a na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396a-31: ta ra ba ya aasma kan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-2: ha kha kha ba yu ba he /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-7: dha na dha n+ye na tsandra aaksha ye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-8: dza la ba la ha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-9: sma ra aasma ra ka na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-10: sam mya ga pra ti banna pa ya sa ta ta k'a li /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-12: ma mi ma ma de tsa ba ra sv'a h'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-14: yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-15: byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-16: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad pa de dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-17: de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-20: bdud kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-23: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-35: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-36: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-38: skyes bu dam pa; khyod bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-39: pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:396b-41: kho bo cag gi bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-3: pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu mngon par grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-5: skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba can du spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-6: de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-7: bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-8: rjes su mthun pa'i grogs bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-10: khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-11: bdud dge sbyong me tog gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-12: bzhin bzang dag ;de bzhin du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-13: sems can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-15: dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de'ang bdag cag la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-19: khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397a-20: 'di nyid du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi ba bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyi'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-0: bdag lba na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @397b tu lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-1: de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas bdud dge sbyong me tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-3: bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo padma'i gdong longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-4: khyod kyis de ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab; ;rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-5: gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-6: chos rnams rang bzhin dri med dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-7: stong nyid mtshan ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul las rab grol bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-8: rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring por mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-9: sangs rgyas dgra thul blo gros shin tu bstan pa nyid du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-10: de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-11: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:397b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-0: bskal pa bzang po byung nas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs @398a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-1: pa 'khor ba 'jig gi spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-2: sems can rnams kyi nad brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin blangs te rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-3: rtsva ba sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-4: sems can rnams longs spyod du bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-5: nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du sman bcud kyis len brgya rtsa bzhi sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-6: rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-7: 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-8: mar las bsgral ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-9: 'bru mar las bsgral ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-10: bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-11: sman nad med ces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhin nas bska ba'i phye ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-13: snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rtsa bzhi bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-14: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-15: nad zhi bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398a-16: sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas pa la kun spyad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas der bdag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig rten gis bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @398b zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-3: der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-4: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang de skad ces bka' stsal to; ;de'i 'og tu 'od srung gis kyang bdag la de skad ces bka' stsal nas de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du bskal pa chen po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sman chen po bcud kyis len gyis lhar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-5: der yang bdag gis sems can kun spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-6: nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas rtsva dang; rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-10: 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-11: de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'tshal nas sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-14: bdag med par so sor rtog par gang 'jug pa de'ang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:398b-15: ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes pa'i mthu chen po bgyid pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi @399a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-5: sems can nad pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-6: bsnyen bkur bgyi ba 'di lta bus bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-8: de ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-9: skal pa chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-12: dge sbyong me tog 'di'i grogs su yang gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-13: bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-14: bud med rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-16: yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-17: rgan po rnams kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du sa'i bcud las byin blangs la zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-21: ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-22: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399a-23: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis @399b bdag la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-1: zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-3: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-9: khyed ni 'jig rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-10: de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-11: padma ldan pa zhing gtsang padma der //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-12: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-15: khyod ni ri dang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-16: khyod kyi re ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-17: rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-18: ye shes dbang phyug ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-19: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-20: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-21: khyod kyis 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-22: me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:399b-23: zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-0: nyi ma mchog gi bde bar @400a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-2: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba ston zhes bya bas lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-4: 'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-5: skye bo byang chub yongs su smin byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-6: skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-7: me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-8: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can la g-yo zhing rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-10: g-yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-11: khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-12: rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don mthor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-13: zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-14: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i sgron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bar du de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-0: mi gnas ye shes @400b ston pa mya ngan med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-1: yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-2: sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med zhing du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-3: ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mchog smra ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-6: sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-7: me tog spos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-8: me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-9: kun nas spos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pas tshon sna tshogs la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-12: 'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-13: dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-14: sngon por snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-15: rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:400b-16: de bzhin du sa bon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-0: 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par @401a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-1: 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-2: bud med shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-3: de dag tshigs su bcad pa re res lung bstan pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-5: pho mtshan gyur te mo mtshan thob pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-6: shin tu rnyed par sla la; mo mtshan gyur te pho mtshan thob pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-7: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-8: de'i tshe na lha dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-9: tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-10: de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-11: bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-12: lha dang mi'i bu mo mi 'khrugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-13: bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-14: mi ma yin pa'i bar dang; bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-21: bu mo gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401a-22: tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-7: sha za bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-9: sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-10: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-11: sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-14: gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-15: sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-16: 'bras bu thob nas 'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-17: sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems bskyed nas sangs rgyas nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-20: de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-21: bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-22: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-23: yi ger 'bri ba nas 'chang bar bgyid pa'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rig pas yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-24: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:401b-25: lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin @402a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-1: gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-6: yo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-7: ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du sems bskyed ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-8: gang gi slad du 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-9: ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-14: bsham pa 'byor par 'gyur ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-15: ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag skyes bu chen po mthu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-16: sems can rnams la longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-17: yongs su spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-18: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs rje chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402a-21: bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa yid la mdzad pas skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-0: yid la re ba yongs @402b su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-10: ma h'a k'a ru na ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-11: ma h'a pra ti ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-21: aa ha na na ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-23: bh'u ta ko ti ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-24: ni ra bri ti ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-25: tri ya la na ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-26: tree dh'a tu ka ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-27: tri bi mo ksha ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-29: rashti aa dhishth'a na ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-30: ba ba ba ba ba ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-31: sa ma tra ya na n+ya sa ma t'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-34: siddhi sarba ku la sha la mu la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-37: khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-39: yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-40: khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-41: yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-43: rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-44: lha mo sa 'dzin la sogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:402b-45: byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-0: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas de dag thams cad mgrin @403a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-1: gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-2: bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-3: byin gyi rlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-4: bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes de sgrub par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-5: bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson pa drag pos spro bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-6: yang sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rang gi dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-7: lha'am klu nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgyid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-9: rnam par ma rungs par bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-10: bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du gal te de ma bzlog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-12: bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-13: bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403a-15: lha nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-0: dge slong @403b ma'am; dge bsnyen nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-2: gal te bdag cag gis de dag la bzlog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-3: bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug ba zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-4: bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-5: bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-7: byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-15: zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-28: 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-30: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-31: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni; ma gtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:403b-32: bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar [?] par ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-0: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur @404a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-2: bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-3: de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de dag la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-6: khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-8: khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-10: thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-11: de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhel byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-12: sdig can khyod ni rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-13: thub pa la ni khyod kyis bsdo zhing snyog par byed pa gtang bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-14: de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-15: khyod kyi tshig gis byang chub dri med dad pa'i sems gcig bdag mi bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-16: thub pa ma gsung bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-17: de dag lhan cig bdag gi yul na dpung dang bzhon par gnas par bgyi; ;phun sum mchog 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho ba khyod kyi dbang mi mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-18: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404a-19: snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu ba'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-0: @404b bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-1: yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mand'a ra ba'i dri mos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-2: ji ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-7: snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis sems can rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-9: sdig pa'i lta ba las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-11: shes rab kyi sgron ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-15: chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-16: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-22: da ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:404b-23: chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-1: rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-3: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyid par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-4: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-5: 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-6: bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mandr'a ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob la rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-21: chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-22: gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi po 'di dag na gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-23: chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405a-25: 'jig rten skyong ba gnas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mand'a ra ba'i dri mos kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' @405b dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-2: gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di shin tu dkon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-6: khyod la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-7: sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-8: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-9: bla na med pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-10: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-11: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so; ;chu'i khams thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-13: rlung gi khams thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-14: nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:405b-15: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-9: lto phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-10: gang dag gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-11: gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-13: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te khyod kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-14: ci nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-15: nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-17: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas yi ger bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-22: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406a-25: bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-0: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung par bya ba nas yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis @406b shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-3: mi nub par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-4: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-6: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-7: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis 'dus te sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-8: chos kyi tshul 'di'ang byin gyis brlab par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-9: chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-10: yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-12: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-13: de bzhin du ded kyis kyang da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-14: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:406b-15: gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-2: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-3: ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-6: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-7: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-10: dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-13: bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-14: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-24: dgon pa'i gnas nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod de 'chad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-27: tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-28: chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-29: sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407a-30: khyed des mdangs dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-3: pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-6: mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang srung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-7: de dag gis rgyal srid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-9: de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-10: dzambu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang mngon par chos kyi bcud des tshim nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-11: rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la'ang mngon par yid ches par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-13: ser sna med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-14: phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-15: sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems nas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-16: so so bdag gi yul la'ang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-17: dzambu'i gling 'di'ang skye bo rigs pas gang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-18: shin tu lo legs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-20: mi'i skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-21: 'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-28: bde ba la reg par gnas pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:407b-33: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-3: srin po ma rungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-7: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-8: char rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-15: dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-16: sems can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-17: 'di nas shin 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-18: de dag kyang khyed kyi g-yog tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-19: de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-20: sems can rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-21: grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-22: bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-23: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-24: mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-25: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-26: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408a-27: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-0: yid kyi @408b 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-1: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na'ang 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-2: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-4: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-5: bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-8: yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-9: lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-10: dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-11: zhi zhing phra ba'i las thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-12: yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs de shin tu snum par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-13: 'bras bu mdangs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:408b-27: bya skyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-5: yo byad rnams shin tu mchog tu 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-6: de na sems can gang dag zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-7: skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-8: shin tu nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-13: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-15: dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-16: sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su spong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-17: de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyed dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-18: de dag khyed g-yog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-19: chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs yongs su bskyang bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-20: sems can rnams chos kyi don la tshud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-21: de ltar na khyod kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mand'a ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-24: bsrung ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409a-25: tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-0: brgya byin gyi dbang po @409b nas tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-1: lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal cher gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas spro ba mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-2: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa 'di dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-4: bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing gus pa chen pos gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-5: snying rjes sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba nas bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-11: dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-12: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas bar bgyi ba'i slad du sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:409b-13: yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-3: tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-4: gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-5: sems can gzi brjid che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-6: gzi brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-7: bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-8: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-9: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-11: chos nyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-13: gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-18: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-19: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410a-28: tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-0: chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du @410b nan tan cher bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-1: chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag kyang shin tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-2: bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-3: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-8: khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-11: gnyi ga'i phyir nan tan gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-12: de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-13: 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-14: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-15: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-16: khyed ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-17: de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-20: lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-21: gang dag yang sems can gzi brjid che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-22: gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dus te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:410b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-1: chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rigs pas blang bar bgyi ba nas grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-7: dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-8: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-10: gang dag yang chos srung bar gnas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-12: chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-16: dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-17: bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-28: yo byad thams cad kyi bar gyis bsti stang du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-31: ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-32: bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par 'du shes pas gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411a-34: ba dang gyis bsti stang du bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-0: bla mar @411b bgyi; ri mor bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i tshe chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-9: phyogs dang g-yog tu ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-10: chos dang mthu thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-11: de ltar bdag cag gis yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-17: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-18: dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-31: mi dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-40: tsha ba rnams dus gsum du 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-46: dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:411b-50: zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-3: lteng ka'ang shin tu gtams par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-4: gang du sems can rnams chu'i glang gis gnod par gyur pa'ang bdag cag gis bsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-8: ljongs de dag tu'ang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-16: lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-19: ro che zhing mang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-20: sems can rnams la nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-24: lhab lhub kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-25: sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-26: sdig pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-28: bsod nams 'byung ba tshe ring por bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-34: pho brang 'khor gang dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-35: tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412a-38: bsti stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyin bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-0: de dag la @412b gnod pa bsal bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-16: ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-17: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam drang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-22: khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-23: de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-34: bu mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bgyi ba nas ngo tsha shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-35: khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-36: tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-37: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas glegs bam la bris te bzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-38: sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-39: rtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:412b-40: chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan cher bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-0: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de @413a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-1: dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-6: khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-7: khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-8: dkon mchog gsum mi nub par nan tan byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-9: de ltar khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-10: 'dus pa chen po rin po che rtog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-11: kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-17: lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-19: nga sems can la snying rje'i smon lam gyis nyon mos pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-20: sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-21: nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-22: g-yon can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-24: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413a-26: sems can tshad med pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-0: sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar @413b par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-1: dam pa'i chos kyi char ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-6: des gang gi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-8: sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-9: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-10: mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-11: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-12: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-13: de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-14: gang nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-20: dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-21: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:413b-22: tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-0: @414a *// gang bsam gtan dang po sgom pa nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa sgom pa'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-1: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'du bya ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-2: gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba da ltar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de dag thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad do; ;gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gis bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-4: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-6: grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na chos smra ba shin tu khrus byas te gos gsar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414a-8: ras sna tshogs bting ba'i sengge'i khri la 'dug ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-0: tha na glegs bam la @414b bris te klog pa der gal te khyod chos nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-2: chos nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyab ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-5: gnyi ga mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir der ma dong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-6: de'i phyir khyed kyis bslus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-7: lam bskyed pa la rmongs par bya par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi med kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-11: ma mchis pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi bar du nub par gyur pa na grong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-22: dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-25: dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-26: gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos gsar pa 'tshal te me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-27: ras bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs bting ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:414b-28: ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i sengge'i khri la 'dug ste lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bris te klog pa der chos nyan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-2: chos nyin pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-5: gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'am; dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par bgyi ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-6: chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-7: ye shes snang ba chen po mchog ge lam la 'jug pa'i slad du bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-9: grong nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-10: sems can de dag gi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-13: bang ba mang por rab tu dgang ba'i slad du der ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor pa'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-19: ya mi kha kha kha kha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-20: kha ba kha ba kha ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-23: gal te bdag chos nyan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-24: chos smra ba bsrung ba nas nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-27: bang ba mang po rnams par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi pa'i bar gyi slad du der ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-28: yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415a-29: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @415b chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-3: lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-4: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-5: de nas koo shi kas 'di skad ces [?] gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-8: ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-9: gror khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-16: aa mu ba ha aa ka ta ta; aa kha aa sha kha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-19: bdag gis ngam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-21: bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-22: mi ma yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-23: zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-24: de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-27: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gnang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-30: bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-32: au kha na ba na ba sa ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-33: sa mu dra sad did dzny'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-35: wa ru na ba b'a r'a dz'a sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:415b-37: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-1: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-2: de nas mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-5: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-14: aa ma sa r'a dza na tsarya ya mu dza sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-16: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-17: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-18: de nas yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-21: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-24: bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-32: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-33: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416a-34: de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bang du gang dang @416b gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung bar ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-3: bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-5: kshu tre kshu kshu kshu tre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-8: aa na ya na kshu tre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-10: sa ga ra hri da kshu tre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-12: dharma ksha ya mu tre sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-14: mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-15: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-16: yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'di na yongs su skyong pa stong nyis brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-17: gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-25: lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-26: rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-29: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar du nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe grong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-36: rgyal po'i pho brang ngam; bram ze'i khyim mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-38: bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:416b-39: dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-2: gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos gsar pa bgos te me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-3: spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-4: ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis gtams pas brgyan pa'i sengge'i khri la mchis te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-5: glegs bam la bris te klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-7: chos smra ba bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-9: sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-10: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du grong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-11: grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-12: 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-14: der sems can rnams kyi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-17: bang ba mang po rab tu ma gtams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-19: der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-23: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-24: dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417a-27: tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-1: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bslus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-3: mnyes par ma bgyis par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-4: lus la sha bkras btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-5: lta ba yongs su nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-7: bdag cag g-yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-8: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-12: ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-14: chos nyan pa de dag gi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-17: kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-18: rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-19: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-20: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-22: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:417b-25: gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-3: byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-4: ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-9: bdud sdig can g-yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-10: 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-11: ma 'ongs dus na'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di glags lta zhing skabs tshol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-12: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-13: nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-14: de bzhin du g-yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-15: g-yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya po 'di dag kyang g-yog dang bcas pa dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-16: 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' bas 'di dag da ltar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-17: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-18: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-19: nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-21: sngon chang 'khon du bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-23: mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-24: dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418a-25: smon lam ma btab pa'i phyir sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-3: rab tu gtong bar mi byed do //
