K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-4: sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-5: gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-6: byang chub sems dpa' ltar mo can gyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-8: 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par gyur pa na'ang de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-13: yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-15: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:418b-17: drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas de stan las langs te kun tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar byas te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @419a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-1: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-12: bdud g-yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig 'di la gson cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-13: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can thams cad rnam par gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-15: yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-16: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-19: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-20: ngan par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-21: ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-22: theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-25: bzod pa la dgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419a-27: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-0: de la khyed kyis kyang @419b ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-1: sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di'ang rnam par mi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-2: sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par da ltar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang bdud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-4: bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' yang 'tshe ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-6: nub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-7: gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-8: chos la nan tan bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-10: chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-14: gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la mngon par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-15: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-16: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-17: khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-18: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-23: bdud kyi pho nyas gtse ba'i bsam pas glags lta ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-24: skabs tshol du mchi zhing g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:419b-25: dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-0: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-2: bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-14: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-15: gang su dag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-16: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-17: bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-19: bdud kyi 'khor de nan tur gyis tshar gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-23: rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshad par bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420a-29: bdud kyi pho nya gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-0: tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sems 'khrug par bgyid pa nas dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'dri bar bgyid pa'i bar du @420b nan tan bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-6: ri brag de rnams ma rungs par bgyid par sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-7: gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur pa de dag tu than skad cig gcig tsam 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-11: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-12: dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-19: skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-25: ro skye bar mi bgyid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-26: ma rungs par bgyid par 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-27: bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud nas bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis tsha bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-32: las su mi rung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-34: bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong ba nas de'i yan lag thams cad 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-35: slar brkyang mi nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-36: de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-37: de'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrug par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:420b-38: de'i dbang po drug kyang spyod yul la 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-8: bi da dznye ba sa kha ga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-12: m'u la ba nya kha ga spa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-13: khad nya spa; ba ri barta m'u ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-17: na ba h'a dzny'a da dzny'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-21: ta th'a t'a dzny'a da dzny'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-22: sarba de dznye gi aa dhishthi ta dzny'a da dzny'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-23: ba kra ma; tri ga na t'a ksha pa ksha ma ma ksha ma dzny'a ksha bi ta ma ra bi sh'a ya sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-24: thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig tu bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas te 'bras bu med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-25: gang su'ang rung gnod par 'dod pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-26: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-31: lha thams cad kyis kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-32: zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-33: de nas de'i tshe sa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-37: rab tu g-yos te gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-38: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421a-39: de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang 'khrugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-0: de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros la smras @421b pa; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-1: bdud ri byi 'di'i stobs ga las 'ongs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-3: gang snying rje med pa 'dis rang gi phyogs thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-5: pha rol gnon pa thams cad ma lus par bcom ste nag po'i rtsa lag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-7: mi mthun pa chad par smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-8: dge sbyong goo ta ma'i phyogs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-9: mtho bar byas pa bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-11: las su mi rung bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-12: bdag gi phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te snang zhing mtho bar med par byas nas yongs su gdung ba chen pos kyang bdag gdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-17: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi stobs bskyed pas bdud ri byis bdud kyi stobs kyi yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-18: pha rol gnod pa 'dir thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-19: des gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-21: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams par dad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:421b-24: yid kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rang sems bskyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-3: phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med par 'di bas kyang ches sdig pa'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-5: yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-8: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-9: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-10: de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-11: gnod sbyin 'jigs 'jigs lta bu'i gzugs su /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-20: sems can chen po lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i drung nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa koondi n+ya 'od 'phro ba'i spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag gi lus thams cad las rnam par dag cing dri zhim pa'i 'od phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-21: de nas sems can chen po lnga po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nor bu rin po che chen po me'i 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422a-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis de dag gi bsam pa tshul bzhin rnam par dag pa la bltas te 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-0: @422b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snyam nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-2: don gyi dbang gang mthong na; khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-5: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-6: de'i tshe bdag cag lnga spun drung du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-7: de na bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-10: bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar du de na'ang de bzhin du bdag cag sngon gyi smon lam gyis spun drung du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag cag gis mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:422b-12: bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang po byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-0: de nas yang der sems can chen po dge bsnyen yang dag shes bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bas der 'di 'dra ba'i smon lam btab @423a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-1: ste; bdag bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-2: de na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-4: sems can rnams la snying rje dang; snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-5: byad gzugs tha dad pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas lus srul po'i bar du de dag la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste; 'di ltar dad pa thob par byas nas bslab pa 'dzin du btsud la zhi ba'i lam la bkod pa nas de na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i ri dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-8: phag la sogs pa la'ang chos bshad pa nas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-9: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i bar la chos bshad pas yongs su smin par byas nas theg pa gsum po dag la so sor bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-10: de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-12: de bzhin du gnod sbyin shes pa'i sgron mas spre'u'i gzugs kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423a-13: sred spong ra'i gzugs kyis mi khom pas nyam nga bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-0: rgyun bcad glang po che'i gzugs kyis glang @423b po che yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-1: de bzhin du gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po gling bzhi pa na gnas pa khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs btab par gyur nas bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de'i spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol zhing bskal pa bzang po 'di thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-2: 'di na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-7: snying rje dang mi ldan pa nas lus srul po sems can la 'tshe ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-10: mi dge ba'i sems su byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-11: srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-15: dmangs rigs kyi sems 'khrug par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:423b-35: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-0: @424a *// dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-9: ro ma rung par byed pa; sems can gyi bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-13: dge ba'i chos la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-18: rnam par grol ba'i ro nub par byed pa rnams bslab pa 'dzin du btsud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-19: phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas gang tshun chad bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de tshun chad bdag rtag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyi nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-20: gnod sbyin sdig can nas lus srul po'i bar dag theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas nas phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-21: de tshun chad sems can rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-23: tha ma mthong yang brnyas par mi dran gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-24: sems can ci 'dra ma mthong ba de nyid kyi tshul gyis de dag la smras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-26: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424a-29: snying rje'i sems la bzhag ste bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag la phyir mi ldog par so sor bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-0: bdag gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gang dang gang dag tu phyin pa de dang der de dag gnod sbyin @424b 'brog gnas bde bar 'ongs sam zhes tshig tu 'bod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-2: bdag gi ming 'brog gnas zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-3: gang dag da ltar chos rnying pa dang bral zhing sdom pa la mi gnas te gcig tu las nag po spyod pa'i mi de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-4: shi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-7: gang dag las 'dren mar spyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-8: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ma thob pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-9: shi ba'i dus byas nas phal cher gnod sbyin sdig can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-10: gnod sbyin lus srul po'i nang du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-12: da ltar 'jig rten na gnod sbyin sdig can nas gnod sbyin lus srul po'i bar du shin tu phal cher rnam par 'phel te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-13: de dag thams cad kyang dkar po'i phyogs nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-15: da ltar shin tu dus ngan pa la bab pas bdag gis 'jam pos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-16: dus thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar dag chos dmar po la dgod mi nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-25: bu mo 'khrugs pa rnams kyang slar zhi bar bya mi nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:424b-31: pho brang 'khor 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar bya mi nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-0: @425a *// bdag gis 'byung po rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'ang phyir zhing rnam par thar ba'i ro la dgod par yang mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-3: lus srul po thams cad kyi snying la g-yo sbyor ba mi drang ba'i shes pa'ang bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-5: 'byung po rnams kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs kyi tshig drag pa mi bzad pa chen mo yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-6: gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis btab na; gnod sbyin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-12: gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-22: nyin bzhi pa nas srul po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425a-31: lus srul gyi 'khor mo dag gis phyi phyir zhing rgyal rigs dkrug pa nas ljongs kyi bar du dkrug par byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-3: grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-4: 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po drag pa mi bzang ba chen mo rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyur pa der gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-5: lus srul po ma rungs pa de dag gis sngon 'khon du bzung zhing mi dge ba'i las byed pa de dag thams cad btang nas byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-9: snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-16: lus srul po'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-42: 'khrug pa dag zhi bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:425b-46: bya la sogs pa lus dkar po'i mtha' la mngon par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-3: yid bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-7: yang dag par dga' ba la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-9: sems mi ngal bar byang chub kyi lam tshol ba la brtson par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-10: yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-12: ci ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi las kyi dngos grub 'di stsal zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-13: byin gyis rlob par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-14: rjes su yi rang bar mdzad nas bdag gis 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-15: ma rungs pa thams cad dad par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-16: mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad zlog par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-17: dge ba'i phyogs thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-18: 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bgyi ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas bdag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426a-20: 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i yi ge dang sgras gang par bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-0: de bzhin du ci nas kyang 'dir lhags pa'i 'khor rnams dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa'i don tshig dang yi ges tshim par @426b bgyi'o; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-4: dkar po'i phyogs 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis khyod kyi rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlabs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-5: skyes bu dam pa khyod spro bar gyis la 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-6: 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smros shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-7: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis go bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-9: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-15: no la n'i la; ku ta ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-23: ma h'a ri ni ri ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-24: ri mi ri mi ri mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:426b-26: ri shi ma h'a ri shi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-1: lu shu lu; shu lu dhu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-2: ma h'a shu lu shu lu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-12: ni mi ni mi; hi ni hi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-19: dzi na dzi na dzi na ri sha bha sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-24: ljongs nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang gang na 'byung po thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces bgyi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-25: gsang sngags kyi tshig rig pa chen mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa nas lus srul po ma rungs pa'i bar du gang dag sems ma dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-28: yid kyis bslab pa'i sngom pa yongs su mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-29: sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems nye bar mi gzhog pa de dag gi don du bdag gis yang shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-46: hi ri hi ri hi ri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-48: gu ma gu ma gu ma hi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427a-54: ha ta ha ta ha ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-1: aa ba te dzo ba ra yu aa ksha sha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-5: aa ga shi gu ma bhe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-7: sa rba da ga gu ma bhe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-9: sa ma ta gu ma bhe sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-10: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-13: lus srul po thams cad 'khrugs te skrag nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad 'dar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-14: de nas skad cig de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te lan gsum du 'di skad ces sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-17: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas gyis shin tu mi bzad pa 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnon pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-19: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-20: 'brog gnas kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-21: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bzhengs pa'i brda dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-22: rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'i brda bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-23: de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:427b-24: sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu 'dar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-0: thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yang @428a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-1: g-yos; nam mkha' las kyang me tog gi char bab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-2: bar snang las kyang sil snyan bye ba'i sgra byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-4: bdug pa thams cad kyang shin tu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par byas nas 'khor thams cad thal mo sbyar te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan gyi dri chen po la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-8: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-11: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-12: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-14: bris nas 'chad par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam dang ldan par 'gyur; sems can de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos du zhig gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-15: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan gyi dri chen pos mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-18: ci nas bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-19: 'thab pa'i rnyog pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-20: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428a-21: dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-0: lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs @428b rgyas thams cad kyi khams drug byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-1: de bzhin du gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis chos bcus byin gyis brlab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-15: grul bum de dag la khyod kyis sems can de dag rtag tu srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-19: yid kyi las dge ba la tshud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-23: kun spyod pa mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-24: nad med pa la mkhas pas bdag gi srog dang yang bsngos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-25: sems can de dag bzung bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-26: ces rig pas gtad nas de dag gi dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-27: blo gros dang; rtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-28: spobs pa la mkhas pas skyon med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-29: de dag gi yid kyi brnag pa 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas gnas par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-30: de dag stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:428b-31: de dag sems dang mtshungs shing zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa la bsdu ba'i dngos po la'ang brtson par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-0: dge ba'i chos la gnas nas sems @429a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-1: can gyi 'khor gyi lus la snying po blangs te dngos po gsum yongs su dag pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-2: ting nge 'dzin rin po che'i rgyal mtshan yang thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-3: ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i shes pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-4: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang sems can de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston cing bzhugs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-8: yi ger ldan pa'i chos bshad pa de lta bu'ang thos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-9: thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-10: mchog tu dga' ba'i bar du thob nas las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba de dag thams cad rnam par shes pa tha ma la chos dang ldan pas mgo mnyam du 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429a-11: ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'tsho zhing gzhes la bzhugs te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig 'chad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der @429b sems can de dag theg pa chen po la gnas shing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can de dag dang 'grogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-1: ring po mi thogs par yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-2: sems can de dag rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par phyin chad nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-3: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-6: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-7: gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar gyi sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bcu po de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-11: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:429b-14: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag phyogs bcu nas 'dir @430a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-1: byon pa de dag thams cad kyis khyed la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam par sbyang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-3: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-4: byang chub kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-5: bdud kyi phyogs pham par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-6: chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-7: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-9: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-10: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-11: ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-12: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-13: lta ba ngan pa thams cad spang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-14: byang chub kyi lam la gzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-16: las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba sngon ma thos pa gzungs kyi tshig zab mo rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-17: de ma chags pa med pa'i gzungs la spobs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-18: ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la gzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-19: tshul gcig pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430a-22: yul srung ba nas gling bzhi srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-0: mi dang @430b mi ma yin pa srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-6: lo tog rnams srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-8: chos nyan pa'i bar dag srung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dngos po re re'ang snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa rnam pa bcus byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-12: dge ba'i chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa yongs su spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-16: bla ma'i gnas ston par kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-17: phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-18: 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-19: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-20: de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa spangs nas dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skyes bu'i mthu chen po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:430b-25: khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bsti stang du byas te dam pa'i chos 'di gzung bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-1: zag khyim na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-3: chos la nan tan byed pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-4: de ltar na khyed la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyis de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-7: phan yon rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-8: gang gis zhing kun gser gyis rab tu bkang nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-9: skyob pa mgon po dag la mchod pa phul ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-10: gang zhig dam pa mchog gi mdo 'di 'dzin byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-11: 'jigs med des ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs kyi dpal gyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-13: brgya tshang pa yi gser rnams las; ;gangg'a'i rlung gi bye ma snyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-14: khyu mchog thub la phul bas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-15: mdo 'di'i bsod nams mtshungs mi thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-17: me tog tshogs kyi gdugs mchog sprin rnams kyis ni nam mkha' khebs byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-18: gang gis mchod phyir dga' mgu'i yid kyis sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-19: gang zhig phyin chad zad 'gyur 'jigs ldan dus na mdo 'di 'dzin byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431a-20: de yi bsod nams tshad dag sems can kun gyis brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-0: de nas bcom @431b ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-1: thub pa'i spyan sngar mar me'i snying po dri zhim til gyis byugs pa ri rab tsam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-2: mar me bus pa 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gus par bskal pa bye bar bzung ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-3: gang gzhan la las bsod nams 'dod pa bsgribs pa srab par smon pa de dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-4: zad pa'i dus tshe 'khor du mdo sde'i gtam byas pa ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-6: blo gros 'chang ba gang gis bzod pa sgom zhing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-7: rtag tu bsam gtan gzhol zhing mnyam bzhag lus kyis shes rab spel ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-8: zad pa'i dus ngan tshen gang zhig dam chos phyag rgya 'di 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-9: de yi bzod dang brtson 'grus 'di ni mtshungs med shes rab gzhal du med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin rdul dang bral ba'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pas kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-11: gang gis mdo 'di bshad nas bzung dang mngon par bris pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-12: gzhan dag 'dzin bcug gus par rtag tu klog pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-13: bdug pa me tog phreng ba gos mchog rnams kyis mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:431b-14: bsod nams gang thob de ni brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-0: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis mdo sde @432a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-3: phan yon dpag tu med par brjod nas brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-5: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-9: phyi ma'i dus na gang thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-15: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-16: 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-17: mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-18: 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-19: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-056-006:432a-20: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
